parameters.name: Objects
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of objects as defined in swSelectType_e of size SelCount VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: SelMarks
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of marks (integers or longs) of size SelCount VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

parameters.name: DrViews
parameters.description: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of drawing views of size selCount VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.

title: IMacroFeatureData.ISetSelections2
description: Sets the selected objects for the macro feature.

   System.Int32
SelCount
,
   ref System.Object
Objects
,

SelMarks
,

DrViews
)

remarks:
The method expects to be passed three arrays of the same size.
See
Accessing Selections that Define Features
for additional details on using this method.
